backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and construction inquiries with access‑controlled admin/user operations and persistent state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and requirements with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including components, styles, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE_REPORT.md: Template for documenting deployment failures, error details, and debugging information.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUT.md: Template for recording latest deployment status, timestamp, commit hash, and executed commands.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook outlining steps for retrying deployment without modifying code.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining construction-themed OKLCH color palette, typography, utilities, and layout helpers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with full SEO metadata, favicons, branding, and scripts for the BuildCraft Construction site.
frontend/public/googlea9cbad697de95c99.h: Google Search Console HTML verification file.
frontend/public/googled81497cd2eafdaf4.h: Google Search Console HTML verification file.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining BuildCraft name, icons, theme color, and display settings.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing the root URL with last modified date and crawl preferences.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring sections, routing via hash, SEO setup, Internet Identity provider, and global query client.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches app failures and displays a fallback refresh screen.
frontend/src/components/BrandAssetPreloa: Preloads brand logo images on mount and logs load success or failures.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, inquiry submission, and success state handling.
frontend/src/components/CountriesBar.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile navigation menu that lists links and triggers scroll navigation when open.
frontend/src/components/screens/SignInSc: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with login, logout, and error display states.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Reusable section header with configurable title, subtitle, and alignment.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with text, team imagery, core values, and partner profiles using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact info, a supporting image, and a contact form sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Builds the hero section with background image, tagline, title, subtitle, and CTA buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a grid of project cards with icons and descriptions pulled from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders service cards with rotating icons and descriptions from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays testimonial cards with quotes, names, and roles based on siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows feature cards explaining value propositions with icons and text from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredDat: Injects organization schema structured data into the document head on mount.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying company info, quick links, and contact details with scroll helpers.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop nav, and mobile menu controlling section scrolling.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides all static site content including company info and data for all sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Custom hook tracking the currently visible page section using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference via a media query and updates on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation to submit inquiries through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeSeo.ts: Updates canonical and social meta URL tags at runtime based on the current deployed origin.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the project's root CSS file.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Centralizes static paths for brand logos and social images.
frontend/src/lib/countries.ts: Empty module placeholder for country data.
frontend/src/lib/isValidEmail.ts: Exports a simple regex-based email format validator.
frontend/src/lib/siteOrigin.ts: Provides helpers to get the site origin and build full URLs for paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration specifying content paths, theme customizations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, feature requirements, and asset needs for aligning the site with buildcraft.co.in.
